snippet: Baseball officials and law enforcement officers are investigating anti-aging clinics in Florida and the work of Anthony Bosch. The clinics might be linked to players and the possible use of banned substances.
abstract: Baseball officials and law enforcement officers are trying to penetrate often opaque world of anti-aging clinics, which have proliferated in Miami area and have become linked to some of sport's biggest stars; former partner of Revive Miami founders, is at center of growing baseball doping scandal.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER, LIZETTE ALVAREZ and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT
byline.contributor: Steve Eder and Lizette Alvarez reported from Miami, and Michael S. Schmidt from Washington. Alain Delaquérière contributed research from New York.

lead_paragraph: Baseball officials and law enforcement officers are investigating anti-aging clinics in Florida and the work of Anthony Bosch. The clinics might be linked to players and the possible use of banned substances.

headline.seo: Baseball Officials Navigate Puzzle of Anti-Aging Clinics
headline.main: Baseball Officials Navigate Puzzle of Anti-Aging Clinics
headline.print_headline: Baseball Officials Navigate Puzzle of Anti-Aging Clinics
